name: Tiny Tumble
description:
Play as either Trixie the grey cat or Ollie the orange cat as they try to make their way down through a series of ever faster platforms. 

Credits:
Animal sprites by pzUH: https://pzuh.itch.io/free-cat-and-dog-sprites

Font is "We Love Cute Things" by Cindyyo: https://www.1001freefonts.com/we-love-cute-things.font

Music is: 

 Happy and Joyful Children by Free Music | https://soundcloud.com/fm_freemusic

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
